meaningMnemonic: If your people can <kanji>relax</kanji> because you <kanji>rule</kanji> over them so well, there is <vocabulary>public order</vocabulary>. You don't want the people you rule being upset or stressed out, you want <vocabulary>public safety</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>public peace</vocabulary> for all!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
